bio: He rejects everything with a "no way!" Becoming a brain-surgeon astronaut is easier than getting past him.

soultimate.name: No Way Through
soultimate.inspiritEffects: Increases own Defense by 350% for 30 seconds
soultimate.description: Defense greatly increased, and foes focus on you.

skill.effect: Slows down Move Meter loss by 15%.
skill.name: Staying Power

name: Noway
